\usepackage{noweb}

\pagestyle{noweb}
% NOTE: Use shift option for wide code.
\noweboptions{smallcode,shortxref,webnumbering,english}
\title{Hello, {\tt noweb}!\\
  {\small An exploration of literate Idris programming via {\tt noweb}.}}
\author{Eric Bailey}
\newcommand{\stylehook}{\marginpar{\raggedright\sl Style hook}}
\begin{document}
\maketitle
\nwfilename{src/idris/hello.nw}\nwbegindocs{1}\nwdocspar

\begin{abstract}
  What follows is an attempt at using
  \href{http://www.cs.tufts.edu/~nr/noweb/}{\tt noweb} to write a literate
  program in Idris. While \href{https://github.com/idris-lang/Idris-dev}{Idris}
  provides some \href{http://www-cs-faculty.stanford.edu/~uno/lp.html}{literate
    programming}
  \href{http://docs.idris-lang.org/en/latest/tutorial/miscellany.html#literate-programming}{support}
  of its own, it's rather basic (like
  \href{https://wiki.haskell.org/Literate_programming}{Literate Haskell}), and
  doesn't allow users to present code chunks out of order or do any sort of
  cross-referencing.
\end{abstract}

\tableofcontents
\newpage

\section{Module Declaration}
\nwenddocs{}\nwbegincode{2}\sublabel{NWHoP6H-4FyBN2-1}\nwmargintag{{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NWHoP6H-4FyBN2-1}}}\moddef{hello~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NWHoP6H-4FyBN2-1}}}\endmoddef\nwstartdeflinemarkup\nwprevnextdefs{\relax}{NWHoP6H-4FyBN2-2}\nwenddeflinemarkup
\LA{}Module declaration~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NWHoP6H-1pw4rR-1}}\RA{}

\nwalsodefined{\\{NWHoP6H-4FyBN2-2}}\nwnotused{hello}\nwendcode{}\nwbegindocs{3}First, we declare the {\tt Main} module, including a docstring, which is
another {\tt noweb} chunk, because we can.

\nwenddocs{}\nwbegincode{4}\sublabel{NWHoP6H-1pw4rR-1}\nwmargintag{{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NWHoP6H-1pw4rR-1}}}\moddef{Module declaration~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NWHoP6H-1pw4rR-1}}}\endmoddef\nwstartdeflinemarkup\nwusesondefline{\\{NWHoP6H-4FyBN2-1}}\nwenddeflinemarkup
||| \LA{}Hello message~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NWHoP6H-4FK8wZ-1}}\RA{}
module Main
\nwused{\\{NWHoP6H-4FyBN2-1}}\nwendcode{}\nwbegindocs{5}\nwdocspar

The docstring above\footnote{The lines of an Idris docstring start with {\tt
    |||}, and immediately precede the definition they document.} consists of the
following message, which we'll also print later, using another {\tt noweb}
reference.
\nwenddocs{}\nwbegincode{6}\sublabel{NWHoP6H-4FK8wZ-1}\nwmargintag{{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NWHoP6H-4FK8wZ-1}}}\moddef{Hello message~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NWHoP6H-4FK8wZ-1}}}\endmoddef\nwstartdeflinemarkup\nwusesondefline{\\{NWHoP6H-1pw4rR-1}\\{NWHoP6H-3i7yrG-1}}\nwenddeflinemarkup
Hello, noweb!
\nwused{\\{NWHoP6H-1pw4rR-1}\\{NWHoP6H-3i7yrG-1}}\nwendcode{}\nwbegindocs{7}\nwdocspar

\section{The {\tt main} Function}
\nwenddocs{}\nwbegincode{8}\sublabel{NWHoP6H-4FyBN2-2}\nwmargintag{{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NWHoP6H-4FyBN2-2}}}\moddef{hello~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NWHoP6H-4FyBN2-1}}}\plusendmoddef\nwstartdeflinemarkup\nwprevnextdefs{NWHoP6H-4FyBN2-1}{\relax}\nwenddeflinemarkup
\LA{}main type signature~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NWHoP6H-4Fe3ro-1}}\RA{}
\LA{}main definition~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NWHoP6H-3i7yrG-1}}\RA{}
\nwendcode{}\nwbegindocs{9}\nwdocspar

{\tt main} is an I/O action that doesn't return any value, i.e.
\nwenddocs{}\nwbegincode{10}\sublabel{NWHoP6H-4Fe3ro-1}\nwmargintag{{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NWHoP6H-4Fe3ro-1}}}\moddef{main type signature~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NWHoP6H-4Fe3ro-1}}}\endmoddef\nwstartdeflinemarkup\nwusesondefline{\\{NWHoP6H-4FyBN2-2}}\nwenddeflinemarkup
\nwindexdefn{\nwixident{main}}{main}{NWHoP6H-4Fe3ro-1}\nwlinkedidentc{main}{NWHoP6H-4Fe3ro-1} : IO ()
\nwused{\\{NWHoP6H-4FyBN2-2}}\nwidentdefs{\\{{\nwixident{main}}{main}}}\nwendcode{}\nwbegindocs{11}\nwdocspar

The action, when run, will output the message to {\tt stdout} with a trailing
newline.
\nwenddocs{}\nwbegincode{12}\sublabel{NWHoP6H-3i7yrG-1}\nwmargintag{{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NWHoP6H-3i7yrG-1}}}\moddef{main definition~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NWHoP6H-3i7yrG-1}}}\endmoddef\nwstartdeflinemarkup\nwusesondefline{\\{NWHoP6H-4FyBN2-2}}\nwenddeflinemarkup
\nwlinkedidentc{main}{NWHoP6H-4Fe3ro-1} = putStrLn "\LA{}Hello message~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NWHoP6H-4FK8wZ-1}}\RA{}"
\nwused{\\{NWHoP6H-4FyBN2-2}}\nwidentuses{\\{{\nwixident{main}}{main}}}\nwindexuse{\nwixident{main}}{main}{NWHoP6H-3i7yrG-1}\nwendcode{}

\nwixlogsorted{c}{{hello}{NWHoP6H-4FyBN2-1}{\nwixd{NWHoP6H-4FyBN2-1}\nwixd{NWHoP6H-4FyBN2-2}}}%
\nwixlogsorted{c}{{Hello message}{NWHoP6H-4FK8wZ-1}{\nwixu{NWHoP6H-1pw4rR-1}\nwixd{NWHoP6H-4FK8wZ-1}\nwixu{NWHoP6H-3i7yrG-1}}}%
\nwixlogsorted{c}{{main definition}{NWHoP6H-3i7yrG-1}{\nwixu{NWHoP6H-4FyBN2-2}\nwixd{NWHoP6H-3i7yrG-1}}}%
\nwixlogsorted{c}{{main type signature}{NWHoP6H-4Fe3ro-1}{\nwixu{NWHoP6H-4FyBN2-2}\nwixd{NWHoP6H-4Fe3ro-1}}}%
\nwixlogsorted{c}{{Module declaration}{NWHoP6H-1pw4rR-1}{\nwixu{NWHoP6H-4FyBN2-1}\nwixd{NWHoP6H-1pw4rR-1}}}%
\nwixlogsorted{i}{{\nwixident{main}}{main}}%
\nwbegindocs{13}\nwdocspar
